page.title: 16A Local Business.
page.content: {An account written by Paula Martin. My family own three shops in this area.We used to have four but we sold the fish and chip shop because it was too much for my family to cope with.We have a small shop in the community of Six Bells which sells gifts as well as some groceries,we also have a shop in Brynithel,which sells newspapers,food, sweets and cigarrettes, our third shop is in Llanhilleth and we call this one "The Mini Market" because we sell almost everything.My mother,father and oldest sister look after these three shops,but sometimes I help.
